headline: Why Hess Midstream, CMS Energy, And Comcast Are Winners For Passive Income
summary: Companies with a long history of paying dividends and consistently hiking them remain appealing to income-focused investors. Hess Midstream, CMS Energy, and Comcast have rewarded shareholders for years and recently announced dividend increases. These ...

headline: Netflix co-CEO sees Warner split as part of broader ‘shakeout’
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Warner Bros. Discovery Inc.’s decision to split into two independent companies is a sign of a broader “shakeout” across a media industry that has become increasingly dominated by streaming and on-demand services, Netflix Inc. co-Chief Executive Officer Greg Peters said.Most Read from BloombergShuttered NY College Has Alumni Fighting Over Its FutureTrump’s Military Parade Has Washington Bracing for Tanks and WeaponryNYC Renters Brace for Price Hikes After Broker-Fee BanNY Long Isla

headline: FPA Crescent Fund Q1 2025  Commentary
summary: The FPA Crescent Fund (Inst) declined 0.20% in Q1 2025 but gained 7.37% in the trailing twelve months. Click here to read the full commentary.
